name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Principal Software Engineer with over 10 years of experience in designing and delivering robust backend systems, with a strong focus on **.NET 8**, **C#**, and **Entity Framework Core**. Proven expertise in leveraging **Azure** services, including **Azure App Services**, **Azure Functions**, **Azure Service Bus**, and **Azure Storage** to develop scalable, high-performance solutions. Demonstrated ability to implement **Microservices**, **Event-driven architectures**, and **RESTful APIs**, while also ensuring efficient CI/CD processes using **Azure DevOps** and **GitHub Actions**. Strong understanding of **Infrastructure as Code** with **Terraform**, and proficient in **Docker** for containerization. Committed to best practices in **Agile methodologies**, **Domain-Driven Design (DDD)**, and **CQRS**. A collaborative leader known for excellent communication skills, mentoring capabilities, and successfully contributing to high-impact projects in leading organizations.
